events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund because this is not what I ordered and is unusable for me.
The issue has been identified as a refund request by the system due to the customer's complaint about receiving the incorrect product.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this refund request regarding the wrong item sent.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Let's get this sorted out for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 9876543210, and I have attached a picture showing the wrong product that was delivered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send a return label for the incorrect item at no cost to you.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the free return label and speedy refund processing.
Your refund has been successfully processed and the return label emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and that everything is now resolved with your order.
We are closing your case now as the refund was completed successfully and no further issues were reported.
